description: This file defines API routes related to user operations in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints to get, update, delete, and list users, utilizing dependencies for database session and authentication.

methods.name: User get_me(current_user: User = Depends(auth_current_user))
methods.description: Returns the current authenticated user's profile.

methods.name: User update_me(payload: UserUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(auth_current_user))
methods.description: Updates the profile or password of the current authenticated user.

methods.name: delete_me(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(auth_current_user))
methods.description: Deletes the current authenticated user's account.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_users( db: Session = Depends(get_db), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page number"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )
methods.description: Lists all users with simple pagination.

ctags.name: delete_me
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_me(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(auth_current_user)):$/

ctags.name: list_users
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page number"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )

ctags.name: repo_delete_user
ctags.pattern: /^from .repositories import list_users as repo_list_users, update_user as repo_update_user, delete/

ctags.name: repo_list_users
ctags.pattern: /^from .repositories import list_users as repo_list_users, update_user as repo_update_user, delete/

ctags.name: repo_update_user
ctags.pattern: /^from .repositories import list_users as repo_list_users, update_user as repo_update_user, delete/

ctags.name: update_me
ctags.pattern: /^def update_me(payload: UserUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(a/
ctags.signature: (payload: UserUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(auth_current_user))
